channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description: can someone tell me how i make a shop and how i make it tradeable. i am new and i dont have a clue so i need to know where i add the code and stuff. by the way, i am using shop maker so i get the code then im stuck. someone help please

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

if your using shop maker it will be almost very easy

  1. copy your code
  2. find Shops.CGF (most of the time i there a sub map CFG)
  3. add it there end save ( open with notepad)
  4. no your shop is added
  5. go to autospawn.CFG
  6. add this : spawn = NPCid xcor ycor 0 0 0 0 0 1
  7. save
    8.compile
  8. go to that spot where you put your npc
  9. enjoy

Read full topic
